mapper.select: SELECT id AS validate_id, NAME, bg_img, align, order_state, balance_state, integral_state, create_time, update_time, shop_id FROM weiit_page_user where shop_id = #{shop_id}
mapper.update: update weiit_page_user set name=#{name}, align=#{align}, bg_img=#{bg_img}, order_state=#{order_state}, balance_state=#{balance_state}, integral_state=#{integral_state}, update_time=now() where shop_id = #{shop_id}
